name: Lost In The Woods (Jehoiakim)
description:
Lost In The Woods Trailer

Lost In The Woods is a first-person Short Motivational/Inspirational Game

This story is about a boy who came back to his hometown after a year in the city when suddenly the path to his hometown changed and he needs to find the correct way to go back home.

Esc Key - Pause

WASD Key - Move

F Key - Pick up Item

E Key - Examine or Interact

Right Mouse Button - Zoom In

Facebook Page:

https://www.facebook.com/gaming/JehoiakimTaniegraGames

Gamejolt:

https://gamejolt.com/games/LostInTheWoods/618410

Itch.io:

https://jehoiakim1010.itch.io/lost-in-the-woods

Requirements:

Minimum

OS: Windows 7,8,10

Memory: 1 GB RAM

Graphics Card: Intel HD Graphics

Storage: 1GB

Recommended:

OS: Windows 7,8,10

Memory: 2 GB RAM

Graphics Card: AMD Radeon(TM) R7 Graphics

Storage: 2GB

Features:

Puzzles:

You will be able to collect and examine objects.

Peaceful Atmosphere:

The game is inspired by the atmosphere of What Remains of Edith Finch.
